content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- European Soccer Events
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'factGameEvents' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.factGameEvents
	(
	 id_odsp nvarchar(256),
	 id_event nvarchar(256),
	 sort_order int,
	 time int,
	 text nvarchar(256),
	 event_type int,
	 event_type2 int,
	 side int,
	 event_team nvarchar(256),
	 opponent nvarchar(256),
	 player nvarchar(256),
	 player2 nvarchar(256),
	 player_in nvarchar(256),
	 player_out nvarchar(256),
	 shot_place int,
	 shot_outcome int,
	 is_goal int,
	 location int,
	 bodypart int,
	 assist_method int,
	 situation int,
	 country nvarchar(256)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO


-- =============================================================================
-- Dimensions
-- =============================================================================
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimAssistMethod' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimAssistMethod (id int, AssistMethod nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimBodyPart' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimBodyPart (id int, BodyPart nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimCountry' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimCountry (Country nvarchar(128), CountryCode nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimEventType' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimEventType (id int, EventType nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimEventType2' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimEventType2 (id int, EventType2 nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimLocation' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimLocation (id int, Location nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimShotOutcome' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimShotOutcome (id int, ShotOutcome nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimShotPlace' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimShotPlace (id int, ShotPlace nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimSide' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimSide (id int, Side nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'dimSituation' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE DataFlow.dimSituation (id int, Situation nvarchar(128))
WITH (DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE, HEAP)
GO
